title: European AI Ethics Guidelines
description: Comprehensive guidelines for ethical AI development and deployment across European institutions.
authors: European Commission AI Ethics Expert Group

title: EuroLLM: A European Large Language Model Dataset
description: Multilingual dataset for training large language models with European language diversity and cultural context.

title: GenAI Benchmark Suite for European Languages
description: Comprehensive benchmarking tools for evaluating generative AI models on European language tasks.

title: Towards Trustworthy AI: European Perspectives
description: Research paper analyzing approaches to building trustworthy AI systems from a European regulatory perspective.

title: Federated Learning Framework for European Healthcare
description: Open-source framework enabling privacy-preserving machine learning across European healthcare institutions.

title: European GenAI Research Survey 2024
description: Annual survey of generative AI research activities, funding, and achievements across European institutions.

title: AI On Demand Platform Resources
description: Centralized European AI platform providing trustworthy AI resources, tools, datasets, and solutions for researchers and industry.

title: INSAIT Research Publications
description: Collection of research papers from INSAIT - Eastern Europe's premier AI institute featuring work on LLMs and AI systems.

title: SwissGPT Technical Documentation
description: Technical resources and documentation for SwissGPT, the Falcon-based multilingual LLM developed by AlpineAI and EPFL.

title: MathArena Evaluation Framework
description: Live evaluation platform for testing large language models on mathematics competitions with human-judged reasoning chains.

title: ADRA Strategic Roadmap
description: Strategic roadmap for responsible and sovereign AI development from the AI, Data & Robotics Association.

title: EU AI Act Implementation Guide
description: Comprehensive guide for implementing the European AI Act with practical guidance from the European AI Office.

title: European Computer Vision Research Network
description: Network of European researchers working on computer vision, image generation, and multimodal AI systems.

title: European Robotics Research Agenda
description: Research agenda for robotics and autonomous systems development across European institutions and industry.

title: Conversational AI in European Languages
description: Large-scale dataset for training conversational AI systems supporting multiple European languages and dialects.
